sentence: Here's a look at some of the available signal-callers: Free Agency: Cam Newton, Ryan Fitzpatrick, Andy Dalton, Jameis Winston, Teddy Bridgewater, Marcus Mariota, Mitchell Trubisky, Tyrod Taylor 2022 NFL Draft: Kenny Pickett (Pittsburgh), Matt Corral (Ole Miss), Malik Willis (Liberty), Desmond Ridder (Cincinnati), Sam Howell (UNC) Given those options, it's fair to wonder whether the Steelers could become heavily involved in the Aaron Rodgers sweepstakes if he's traded or released by the Green Bay Packers.
author: Tim Daniels
title: Steelers' Top QB Options in 2022 Free Agency, NFL Draft as Ben Roethlisberger Retires

sentence: And that’s his play style, that’s why we love him, but a backup quarterback is very important, knowing the way he plays the game.” Fierro noted there are some other veteran options, including former Bills quarterbacks Ryan Fitzpatrick and Tyrod Taylor, but noted that Marcus Mariota could be an especially intriguing option given his rushing ability.
author: Nathan Dougherty
title: Bills Could Target Broncos QB to Replace Mitch Trubisky: Insider

sentence: As has been the case for years, Fitzpatrick works best as a one-season rental, either as a top backup or emergency starter.” Why Fitzpatrick Is a ‘Logical’ Option for Bucs Fitzpatrick missed essentially the entire 2021 season after signing with Washington last offseason.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Buccaneers Considered ‘Logical’ Fit for 17-Year Veteran QB
